page.title: 09New R.C.school in Richmond.
page.content: The R.C. Primary School in Richmond is a new one. It was opened in July 1984. The Headmaster,Mr.M.Larkman,has been with us for 16 years,since 1969 in the old building in Reeth Road. The new school building is a brick building in Cross Lanes with a pitched Aluminium roof. It has well insulated walls and roof.In the walls are energy saving thermalite blocks with polystyrene in the cavities.There are small windows to help save heat in the winter.There is a computerized heating system powered by natural gas.It is unlike schools of older design which had very large windows. We like the new building because it is good for games with playing fields.In our old school in Reeth Road we had no playing field or gym so we had to use the Convent's. .
